title: Legal Interpretations
content:
Legal Interpretations

State Regulations
LI 1 - Banks and Trust Companies (§ LI 1.1 to LI 1.10)
LI 3 - Foreign Banking Corporations (§ LI 3.1)
LI 4 - Savings Banks and Savings and Loan Associations (§ LI 4.1 to LI 4.20)
LI 5 - Credit Unions (§ LI 5.1 to LI 5.2)
LI 6 - Other Licensees (§ LI 6.1 to LI 6.4)
LI 7 - Miscellaneous-Banking Law (§ LI 7.1)
LI 8 - Miscellaneous-Banking Board Regulations, Superintendent's Regulations, Supervisory Policies and Procedures (§ LI 8.1 to LI 8.2)
LI 9 - Miscellaneous-Other (§ LI 9.1 to LI 9.3)
LI 1 Banks and Trust Companies (§ 1.1 to 1.3)
LI 3 Foreign Banking Corporations (§ 3.1)
LI 4 Savings Banks and Savings and Loan Associations (§ 4.1 to 4.3)
LI 6 Other Licensees (§ 6.1)
LI 8 Miscellaneous-Banking Board Regulations, Superintendent's Regulations, Supervisory Policies and Procedures (§ 8.1 to 8.2)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
